title: BEAUTIFUL 2 BEDROOM!!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Enjoy your new life at Brookside Apartment Homes!', 'Stylish living with the convenience of easy access to the I-30 and Highway 360.', 'You are only moments from AT&T Stadium, Six Flags Over Texas, the Texas Rangers Ballpark, and the DFW Airport.', 'As a Brookside resident, you can enjoy an abundance of free amenities, some of which include cable-readiness, central heat and air, extra storage, vinyl hardwood flooring, oversized closets, kitchen appliances, washer/dryer connections, and beautifully tiled back-splashes in your kitchen.', 'Brookside is also close to public transportation and provides covered parking*, laundry facilities, a refreshing swimming pool, a dog park, and more!', 'If you like to work out, make sure to check out our on-site fitness center.', 'When you choose Brookside, you are selecting a fantastic neighborhood surrounded by shops, restaurants, entertainment, and parks.', 'We look forward to having you join our friendly community!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 10, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Pet-friendly!', '$25 monthly, $200 one-time fee per pet.', 'Deposit:', 'Security Deposit: Standard $750.00, Additional $1125.00, Max $1500.00', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'None', 'Application fee:', '$200 for the administration and $50 for each applicant.', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Cable, Internet, Pest, Trash, Maintenance, Reduced secured deposit', 'Utilities Cost:', '166', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Parking notes:', 'None', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Balcony/patio, Yard',
